metadata.title: CVE-2022-27664 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In net/http in Go before 1.18.6 and 1.19.x before 1.19.1, attackers cancause a denial of service because an HTTP/2 connection can hang duringclosing if shutdown were preempted by a fatal error.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-27664` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.13 - 1.13.8-1ubuntu1.2
golang-1.13-go - 1.13.8-1ubuntu1.2
golang-1.13-src - 1.13.8-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

golang-1.16 - 1.16.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.1
golang-1.16-go - 1.16.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.1
golang-1.16-src - 1.16.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.1
No subscription required

golang-1.18 - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~20.04.2
golang-1.18-go - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~20.04.2
golang-1.18-src - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~20.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.13.8-1ubuntu1.2').
golang-1.14 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.16 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.16.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.1').
golang-1.18 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.1-1ubuntu1~20.04.2').
